## 
* /RepositoryGitmastermasterHEAD
* /Working Directory
* /Stage
	* `git add`
	* `git commit`

![](http://cdn.sinacloud.net/woodysblog/git/git.jpg)

## 

```
git clone git@github.com:YuyingWu/blog.git // 
git status // 

// 
git add <file> // 
git rm <file> // 
git checkout -- <file> // 
git reset HEAD <file> // 
git diff HEAD -- <file> // diff

git commit // 

// 
git branch // -d
git checkout branch-n // xx-b
git checkout -b branch-n origin/branch-n // 
git merge branch-n // branch-n

// 
git push origin master // originmaster

// 
git pull // pull = fetch + merge

// push
git init
git remote add origin git@github.com:YuyingWu/blog.git
git add .
git commit -m "init"
git push origin preact:preact
```

## Git

``SSH keySSH
``Macid_rsa.pubid_rsa/Users/xxx/.ssh
```
ssh-keygen -t rsa -C your email address
```

![](http://cdn.sinacloud.net/woodysblog/git/ssh.png)

``git
``.git/configremote "origin"url

![](http://cdn.sinacloud.net/woodysblog/git/remote.png)

``RPC failed
``Git`http post`1MB500MB

```
// Question
error: RPC failed; HTTP 411 curl 22 The requested URL returned error: 411 Length Required
fatal: The remote end hung up unexpectedly

// Solution
git config http.postBuffer  524288000
```
